coreAtributes.name: low cut blouse
coreAtributes.description: A blouse with a particularly low cut, which can result in large breasts being in a precarious situation. This blouse also does nothing to conceal the wearer's bra stap or even the top of the cup, letting everyone see what you have on underneath.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s blouse and roughly pull it off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your blouse and roughly pulls it off over your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s blouse and roughly pulls it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.arms] through the blouse's sleeves as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the blouse down over [npc.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.arms] through the blouse's sleeves, before pulling it down over your torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the blouse down over your head, before pushing your [pc.arms] through the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.arms] through the blouse's sleeves before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the blouse down over [npc2.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your blouse, exposing your ​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​pc.breasts+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly snatch at [npc.namePos] blouse, exposing [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls down your blouse, exposing your ​​​​​​​​​[​​​​​​​​​pc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly snatches at [pc.namePos] blouse, exposing your [pc.breasts+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your blouse back up, covering your [​​​​​​​​​pc.breasts+].
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull up [npc.name]'s blouse, covering their [​​​​​​​​​pc.breasts+].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: #IF npc.hasBreasts() #THEN You roughly force [npc.namePos] [​​​​​​​​​npc.​​​​​​​​​breasts+] back into [npc.her] blouse. #ELSE You roughly pull [npc.namePos] blouse back up to cover [npc.her] flat chest. #ENDIF
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] blouse back up to cover [npc.her] [​​​​​​​​​pc.breasts+].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: #IF pc.hasBreasts() #THEN [npc.Name] roughly forces your [​​​​​​​​​pc.​​​​​​​​​breasts+] back into [pc.namePos] blouse. #ELSE [npc.Name] roughly pulls your blouse back up to cover [pc.namePos] flat chest. #ENDIF
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: #IF npc2.hasBreasts() #THEN [npc1.Name] roughly forces [npc2.namePos] [​​​​​​​​​npc2.​​​​​​​​​breasts+] back into [npc2.her] blouse. #ELSE [npc1.Name] roughly pulls [npc2.namePos] blouse back up to cover [npc2.her] flat chest. #ENDIF

displacementText.playerSelf: #IF pc.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN You pull up your blouse, exposing your pregnant belly. #ELSE You pull up your blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.playerNPC: #IF npc.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN You pull up [npc.namePos] blouse, exposing [npc.namePos] pregnant belly. #ELSE You pull up [npc.namePos] blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.playerNPCRough: #IF npc.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN You roughly grab [npc.namePos] blouse, exposing [npc.namePos] pregnant belly. #ELSE You roughly pull up [npc.namePos] blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.NPCSelf: #IF npc.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN [npc.name] pulls up [npc.her] blouse, exposing [npc.her] pregnant belly. #ELSE [npc.name] pull up [npc.her] blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.NPCPlayer: #IF pc.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN [npc.name] pulls up your blouse, exposing your pregnant belly. #ELSE [npc.name] pulls up your blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: #IF pc.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN [npc1.name] roughly grabs your blouse, exposing your pregnant belly. #ELSE [npc1.name] roughly pulls up your blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: #IF npc2.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN [npc1.name] pulls up [npc2.namePos] blouse, exposing [npc2.namePos] pregnant belly. #ELSE [npc1.name] pulls up [npc2.namePos] blouse. #ENDIF
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: #IF npc2.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN [npc1.name] roughly grabs [npc2.namePos] blouse, exposing [npc2.namePos] pregnant belly. #ELSE [npc1.name] roughly pulls up [npc2.namePos] blouse. #ENDIF

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your blouse back down, covering your stomach.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] blouse back down to cover [npc.her] stomach.
